test.query: SELECT CounterID, COUNT(*) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 0 AND CounterID < 255 GROUP BY CounterID
SELECT CounterID, COUNT(*) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 100 AND CounterID < 400 GROUP BY CounterID
SELECT CounterID, COUNT(*) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 1000 AND CounterID < 5000 GROUP BY CounterID
SELECT CounterID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 0 AND CounterID <= 255 GROUP BY CounterID
SELECT CounterID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 100 AND CounterID < 400 GROUP BY CounterID
SELECT CounterID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID >= 1000 AND CounterID < 5000 GROUP BY CounterID
